formula.name: enactingText
formula.p: Be it enacted by the King’s most Excellent Majesty, by and with the advice and consent of the Lords Spiritual and Temporal, and Commons, in this present Parliament assembled, and by the authority of the same, as follows:—

part.heading: Alcoholic products, other than qualifying draught products, of an alcoholic strength of less than 8.5%

p.b: Alcoholic products, other than spirits, of an alcoholic strength of less than 3.5%
Spirits of an alcoholic strength of less than 3.5%
Still cider of an alcoholic strength of at least 3.5%;
sparkling cider of an alcoholic strength of at least 3.5% but not exceeding 5.5%
Beer of an alcoholic strength of at least 3.5%
Wine and other fermented products of an alcoholic strength of at least 3.5%; sparkling cider of an alcoholic strength exceeding 5.5%
Spirits of an alcoholic strength of at least 3.5%

part.heading: Qualifying draught products of an alcoholic strength of less than 8.5%

b.b: Alcoholic products, other than spirits, of an alcoholic strength of less than 3.5%
Spirits of an alcoholic strength of less than 3.5%
Still cider of an alcoholic strength of at least 3.5%;
sparkling cider of an alcoholic strength of at least 3.5% but not exceeding 5.5%

p.b: Beer of an alcoholic strength of at least 3.5%

b.b: Wine and other fermented products of an alcoholic strength of at least 3.5%; sparkling cider of an alcoholic strength exceeding 5.5%
Spirits of an alcoholic strength of at least 3.5%
